video.title: Doomsday Castle
video.synopsis: With an eye on doomsday, an ex-Army officer and five of his children build a castle in the wilderness with plans to live off the electrical grid.

episodes.synopsis: A retired soldier and his family unite in the remote wilderness to finish building a castle, their fortress of refuge for the end of days.
episodes.title: Before the Flood

episodes.synopsis: Brent Sr. and Dawn-Marie build a catapult to defend the castle from intruders while the rest of the family seeks out foods that are not ready-made.
episodes.title: A Stone from a Sling

episodes.synopsis: Everyone comes together to build a solar-powered water system, but a mock ambush brings tensions to a boil and tests the family's limits.
episodes.title: Water from a Stone

episodes.synopsis: Tensions boil over as the family trains in the martial art of Krav Maga and works together to build a portcullis, observation post and murder hole.
episodes.title: Learn to Fear Me

episodes.synopsis: After failing a tear gas test, the kids break into groups to shutter the windows, plant a survival garden and learn how to midwife.
episodes.title: Be Fruitful and Multiply

episodes.synopsis: After a mystery intruder trespasses on the castle's property, Brent Sr. decides to construct a multilevel defense perimeter system.
episodes.title: The Stranger That Cometh

episodes.synopsis: Brent Sr. and Lindsey put finishing touches on the castle roof while Michael and Brent II create a zip line for quick escapes from enemies.
episodes.title: Escape to the Mountain

episodes.synopsis: Brent Sr. and his friend Sergeant Mike strategize to test the kids’ readiness by conducting a mock siege and surgical strike on the castle.
episodes.title: The Days of Siege
